The ins and outs of my existence I am graduate student in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Wisconsin, Madison. Physics is interesting, but my beauty degree is much more practical. I live with my girlfriend Marci and our two cats, Joe and Charlie. Marci also went to Yale, and now she is getting a masters in public policy from LaFollette Institute . One day, she is going to be president. In: Subba . In: Two titanium screws. Out: My ACL. Out:  Terry Mulholland. Out: Carbon dioxide.
